DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to characterize the performance of the WATCHMAN LAA Closure Device in atrial fibrillation patients for which long term warfarin therapy is contraindicated.
DOC.brief_title: ASA Plavix Feasibility Study With WATCHMAN Left Atrial Appendage Closure Technology
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older paroxysma, persistent, or permanent nonvlavular atrial fibrillation contraindicated to warfarin eligible for clopidogrel, ticlopdine, heparin, or aspirin CHADS score 1 or greater NYHA Class IV LAA obliteration Heart transplant LVEF less than 30% greater than 50% carotid stenosis
